channel.title: The Worst IPick | Cancelled. Everybody wins
channel.description:
## Welcome to the worst IPick game ever. #### Including the best class names #### (yes, I am running 2 Forum Mafia games)
## Rules Standard Forum Rules. No being an arse, cheating, spamming etc. Days will last 72 Hours. Nights will last 36 hours. Extensions will not be granted for forgetting to send an action. Voting is compulsive and plurality based! Majority is in effect! To vote someone up, you simply type /vote playername (bolding it is nice too.) When the majority of the group has voted for someone, they will be immediately lynched! Roles ARE revealed upon death
On join, I will give you a role name and your faction. Come up with a good class for it.
# OP stuff is banned though
## Gameplay Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 48 hours long Actions are done by messaging me Mafia will talk through a Discord server When you receive a class on join. Confirm when all slots are full and you have made your class
## Executions To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” When someone has enough votes, they will be lynched. Executions end the Day
## Journals/Logbooks Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
## Rolelist: **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non Killer[/color]**
## **Players:** 1. Boss110 2. Firekitten 3. Whammerist 4. MtheJoker 6. NightX 7. PKR 8. Wolfy 9. Simon 10. Shurian 11. Insanity 12. Celeste 14. Open Spot 15. eevee 16. Marluxion 17. MaximusPrime 19. CheesyKnives 20. AgentBoin
## Backups
## Timestamp: [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-worst-ipick-20-20/57465/2108?u=pug)
## Graveyard: **NotHippolytus** - died after 18 minutes **Strangle** - **[color=red]Rolename (GONE WRONG) (GONE SEXUAL) (GONE 4K RESOLUTION (NOT CLICKBAIT) (EXTREME CHAOS EDITION)[/color]** - Died N1 **techwolves** - **[color=red]The Anime Fight to the Death between Gordon Ramsay and Guy Fieri[/color]** - Died N1 **Hippolytus** - **[color=green]How many alts can we make in one sitting, world record is 310. I bet you can’t beat my only world record, If you do I will snipe you.[/color]** - Died N1
## Example Rolecard: > # [color=#ff0000]E[/color][color=#ff7f00]x[/color][color=#ffff00]a[/color][color=#00ff00]m[/color][color=#00ffff]p[/color][color=#0000ff]l[/color][color=#8b00ff]e[/color] > **[color=#ff0000]E[/color][color=#ff4000]x[/color][color=#ff7f00]a[/color][color=#ffaa00]m[/color][color=#ffd400]p[/color][color=#ffff00]l[/color][color=#80ff00]e[/color] [color=#00ff80]E[/color][color=#00ffff]x[/color][color=#00aaff]a[/color][color=#0055ff]m[/color][color=#0000ff]p[/color][color=#4600ff]l[/color][color=#8b00ff]e[/color]** > **Passive 1 (Passive)** - This is a passive > **Passive 2 (Passive)** - This is also a passive > **Day 1 (Day)** - Don't normally have two of these if you are Town. - Infinite uses > **Day 2 (Day)** - 2nd one for NK/Mafia and in the rare case town. - 1 use > **Night 1 (Night)** - Kill the player because lol - Infinite uses > **Night 2 (Night)** - AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA - 2 uses

item.title: The Worst IPick | Cancelled. Everybody wins
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Shurian the Durian!

(Alurian Hyrulian Kaboolian Snoolian Doolian Poolian Scuttlebugian The Royal Ghoulian Lorulian Coolian Woolian Quoolian Mega Big Hoolian Stoolian Pogo Stick Durian)

Neutral Killing.

Royal Blood (Passive): Laugh at thee fools who get fooled.

Spiky (Passive): Your visitors will be pricked when visiting you, causing them to bleed and die in one day unless healed by any means. You are death immune.

Off the Pogo Stick(Day): You lose your Spiky Passive permanently. (1 use.)

Roll (Night): Durians are prickly! Bleed someone if you have Spiky. If not, this attack goes through death immunity. (Infinite uses.)

Piece of Me (Night): Heal a player. (1 use.)

Original one before reroll

Read full topic
